task: Come up with a theme for the new RL YouTube idea discussed
comments: This task involves brainstorming and deciding on a theme based on recent discussions about the new RL YouTube project.
email_content:
Dear Alex

I hope this email finds you well

Please take a look at the new RL youtube idea that we just talked about and
come up with a theme.
Deadline is 24 July 2025 19:00

Best regards
Jesse Huang
